description: Shopee Open Platform documentation for developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs

platform_description.title: What is Shopee Open Platform?
platform_description.description: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services

key_features.name: Powerful APIs
key_features.description: Get access to a wide range of Open APIs for orders, products, marketing and more, including push notification services

key_features.name: Comprehensive developer services
key_features.description: End-to-end developer support at all stages of onboarding, APP development, APP testing, APP release, and APP maintenance

key_features.name: API Management
features: Access Open API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox testing environments
Get important information through Announcement page, Documentation, and Support Center

benefits.title: Benefits of using Shopee Open API?
benefits.description: Provides sellers with quick and easy access to important shop data for selling on Shopee, including product, order, and campaign management across all markets

access_types.title: Who can access Shopee Open Platform?

user_types.description: Access to comprehensive range of Open APIs for software businesses covering key ecommerce processes
For sellers who want to develop custom software and integrate systems for operations optimization and data management

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of the Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its features, benefits, and access types.
